ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 36
ygData.msgSnippet: Just so yall know..  Aradune is not decked out as he was in beta.  BETA was just that.. BETA.  In release, he s just as watched as the rest of us.  He has to
ygData.messageBody:
Just so yall know.. Aradune is not decked out as he was in beta. BETA
was just that.. BETA. In release, he's just as watched as the rest of
us. He has to earn everything just like the rest of us. He may be high
lvl (i don't know) but i assure you he's not packin anything he didn't
earn. As for the green splinted platemail.. I talked to a lvl 48
cleric and he said his group still had a couple levels to go before they
could make a run at getting some of it.
